alert.note: Alert for Converse; Niobrara (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 6:55PM MDT until June 23 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Niobrara County in east central Wyoming... Northeastern Converse County in east central Wyoming... * Until 745 PM MDT. * At 655 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Dull Center, or 27 miles southeast of Wright, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Niobrara and northeastern Converse Counties. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for east central Wyoming. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for east central Wyoming.
